doc.field: TOSHIBA SETS UP HONG KONG CIRCUIT DESIGN CENTRE

Toshiba Corp TSBA.T> said it has set up a design centre for large integrated circuits (LSI) in Hong Kong. The centre, located at its wholly-owned Hong Kong subsidiary Toshiba Electronics Asia Ltd>, will start operations to help create new demand for semi-customized LSI from April 1. Toshiba has nine LSI design centres in the U.S., Europe and Japan. REUETER
